column2: As it is every true Chronicler's duty, I shall swear my oaths and observe all lectures presenting Monad's Great Life-Stream and apply myself to vigorously to the preseveration and restoration Monad's Great Vision.
I shall swear as a [branch_nuclearism.GetName] and see Atomos' Realm!
I shall swear as a [branch_medicalism.GetName] and discover the essence of perfection!
I shall swear as a [branch_industrialism.GetName], for I shall build great wonders!
